EmailTemplate.name: Trial lic extn_Infosys
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for your interest in Tricentis Tosca
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!NullValue(Contact.FirstName, "Sir or Madam")},
Thank you for your interest in Tricentis Tosca.
I received notification that you requested a trial license extension. Please reply to this e-mail with how you are using the license. Examples can include external (customer), internal or personal investigation. Can I answer any question for you about either Tricentis or Tosca? As a note, Tricentis is a strategic Infosys partner with joint customers in all 3 regions and a Tosca CoE. Infosys also has over 150 trained and certified Tosca consultants.
Lastly, here are a couple links to key Tosca tools and information:
Download fact sheets, case studies and whitepapers from our webpage at http://www.tricentis.com/resources/ Take our free online training at https://www.udemy.com/get-in-touch-with-tricentis-tosca-testsuite/
Best regards, {!User.Name} {!User.Title}
Tricentis m - {!User.MobilePhone} e - {!User.Email}
Tricentis GmbH Company Headquarters: Saturn Tower, Leonard-Bernstein-Stra√üe 10, 1220 Vienna FN 213896d Handelsgericht Wien
Tricentis US Headquarters, 5150 El Camino Real, Suite D14, Los Altos, CA 94022
